snippet: For 2013, Ford has updated the Taurus SHO, a car for driving enthusiasts who need the practicality of a large sedan. The car is straight-line quick, but it lacks the athletic balance of a rear-drive sport sedan.
abstract: Around the Block column review of 2013 Ford Taurus SHO.
lead_paragraph: For 2013, Ford has updated the Taurus SHO, a car for driving enthusiasts who need the practicality of a large sedan. The car is straight-line quick, but it lacks the athletic balance of a rear-drive sport sedan.

headline.seo: Hot Ford No Longer Flies Under the Radar
headline.main: Hot Ford No Longer Flies Under the Radar
headline.print_headline: Hot Ford No Longer Flies Under the Radar
